title: Senior VueJS  Front-End Developer
description: We are a Digital Lending Solutions Provider focusing on building a complete suite of products for the Mortgage Industry. We are looking for a Full-Time Senior Level Front-End Developer with U.S. Residential Mortgage experience, to be a contributor to the development and enhancement of our cutting-edge projects, ensuring they meet the highest standards of performance and user experience. If you possess expertise in VueJS, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, XML, JSON, along with other valuable skills, we want to hear from you! Responsibilities: *Utilize your expertise in VueJS, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, JSON, XML, to implement innovative features and functionalities. *Take ownership of code testing to ensure the reliability and efficiency of the applications. *Work closely with UX/UI designers to translate design concepts into intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces. *Participate in code reviews, offer constructive feedback, and encourage best practices. *Troubleshoot and resolve issues promptly to maintain optimal performance. *Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies, incorporating relevant advancements into the development process. Requirements: *Proven experience as a Front-End Developer with a focus on VueJS, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, JSON, XML. *Work and be available during your time zones normal business hours. *Strong ability to test your own code, ensuring its quality and adherence to project specifications. *A keen eye for design, with a passion for creating user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing interfaces. *Fluent in English with excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. *Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a team environment. *Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive attitude towards challenges. If you are an enthusiastic Senior Front-End Developer with a strong skill set in VueJS, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, JSON and XML, and you possess the ability to test your own code while maintaining a keen eye for design, we encourage you to apply! Please also mention if you have experience working with C#, asp.net, razor pages, mysql, sqlserver. Please do not respond with a standard cover letter. Thank you for your time.
